body_html:
@gunan Thanks for the quick response! Now everything is independent, so you can do any combination of MKL, SIMD and OpenMP you want. Not sure why that structure was there originally.

Does it make sense to add a flag to enable openMP conditionally or should it just always be used if available? Not having a flag for openMP makes it harder to cross-compile. I'll add that in another PR if it makes sense. I would think default to true.
